Bash(--notes "# requests-async v0.2.2

## 🐛 Bug Fixes
- Fixed \`proxies\` parameter support in convenience functions (\`get\`, \`post\`, etc.)
- Added support for \`verify\`, \`cert\`, and \`trust_env\` parameters
- Improved parameter separation between session and request parameters

## 🚀 What''s New
- All convenience functions now properly handle proxy configurations
- Better compatibility with requests-style parameter usage
- Enhanced session parameter handling

## 📦 Installation
\`\`\`bash
pip install requests-async==0.2.2
\`\`\`

## 🔧 Usage
\`\`\`python
import requests_async

# Now works with proxy parameters
response = await requests_async.post(
    ''https://api.example.com'',
    json={''data'': ''test''},
    proxies={''http'': ''http://proxy:port''},
    verify=False
)
\`\`\`

## 🙏 Thanks
This release fixes critical issues with proxy parameter handling. Thank you for reporting the bug!
